item.title: Gas Atomization System (Part 1: Prototyping)
item.description:
Introduction

This Spring (and the coming summer and fall), I’m working with the Plasma Science Fusion Center at MIT to develop a gas atomization system that will enable the research and development of new materials for the additive manufacturing of fusion reactor components.
